{"id":890432633,"question_id":6,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1675392481,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/890432633/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public String convert(String s, int numRows) {\n        int len = s.length();\n        \n        List<List<Character>> list = new ArrayList<>();\n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            list.add(new ArrayList<>());\n        }\n        \n        int i=0;\n        while(i<len){\n            \n            int idx = i%(( numRows + numRows-2));\n            if(idx>=numRows){\n                idx = (numRows-3) - (idx%(numRows-2))+1;\n            }\n            \n            System.out.println(i + \" \" + idx);\n            \n            list.get(idx).add(s.charAt(i));\n            i++;\n            \n        }\n        \n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        for(int ii=0; ii<len; ii++){\n            \n            for(int j=0; j<list.get(ii).size(); j++){\n                sb.append(list.get(ii).get(j));\n                \n            }\n            \n            System.out.println(sb.toString());\n        }\n        \n        return sb.toString();\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
